Job Title: Sector Sales Leader - Full Stride Cloud

Location: Dallas, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Wipro is a leading global information technology, consulting and business process services company. We harness the power of cognitive computing, hyper-automation, robotics, cloud, analytics and new ground-breaking technologies to help our clients adapt to the digital world and make them a successful and innovative company. We are an organization recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, strong dedication to sustainability and good corporate citizenship, we have over 255,000 amazing employees serving clients across six continents. Together, we discover ideas and connect the dots to build a better and exciting new future.

Wipro's FullStride Cloud business line brings Wipro’s entire suite of cloud capabilities under a fully integrated, full stack offering. Cloud-native applications, cloud architecture, app modernization, cloud strategy and migration, as well as hybrid cloud, data center, digital workplace and infrastructure security constitute a comprehensive set of services to transform business operations and drive growth. We build powerful and differentiated solutions for our clients looking to accelerate their digital transformation journey with cloud. We help clients become intelligent enterprises by building their business in the cloud. Businesses need an end-to-end transformation partner to orchestrate a cloud ecosystem that maximizes innovative, sustainable platforms and products to deliver personalized outcomes. We help transform, accelerate and innovate our clients’ cloud journeys at FullStride Cloud.

We are looking for a Sector Sales Leader for our FullStride Cloud Service Line for developing and generating business growth for the Communications, Retail, Logistics and Services (New Age / Media) industry segments. The role will cover

Digital & Cloud - Digital Transformation & Apps Modernization to cloudCloud Infrastructure Services – CIS

Roles & Responsibilities:

Provide point of view and lead clients in defining their cloud and digital transformation journey, identifying opportunities for business, lead conversations and bring all the capabilities Wipro FullStride Cloud (Wipro Digital & Cloud) team to the market. This includes working with the analysts, partners and other market facing functions for the industry segments.Collaborate with the Client Partners and Global Account Executives to continue to expand Wipro’s presence in named accountsDrive stich complex integrated deals for AIOps enabled Hybrid Managed Services – Cloud Infrastructure Operations across towers (cloud / DC, compute, storage, DR, security, end user services etc.) along with Applications (Digital Apps, Enterprise Packages (SAP, Oracle etc.) Software platforms As-a-service (Service Now, Salesforce)Drive integrated deals that includes Digital Transformation, AIOps enabled Hybrid Managed Services including Cloud Infrastructure along with Enterprise Packages (SAP, Oracle etc.) Software platforms As-a-service (Service Now, Salesforce) and enable client’s cloud migration and modernization agenda.Consultative drive proactive approach to datacenter / cloud transformation, Cloud migration / modernization, workplace / end-user / experience transformation, network / SDWAN transformation, storage transformation.Work with Partner ecosystem across CSPs, OEMs and new age partners to drive a collaborative GTM and proactive deal shapingBe responsible for new Bookings (TCV & ACV) and Revenue growth and drive projections on a monthly basis with no more than a 5% variance.Experience in atleast 2 industry segments from amongst (Retail, Communications, Logistics, Services (New Age / Media) and Network Equipment / Peripherals) with demonstrated annual business growth of 15-20% over the past 3 years.Ability to stich complex biz and technology transformations starting with customer experience and a domain / consulting led approach to transformation initiatives that needs custom / cloud native application development and maintenance, App modernization and migration to cloud, leveraging Agile, DevOps, Integration as a Service & Quality Engineering as key enablers for the digital & cloud transformation

Qualifications:

Must have experience of selling Cloud Infrastructure, Digital Transformation, Application business in an individual capacity and now taken responsibility of a teamMust have led a team of Cloud Infrastructure / Digital Transformation / Application sales practitioners, SMEs / architects in the software services or consulting industry working in the above application portfolios.Must have managed a portfolio of $100-150M or more annually with demonstrated growth over the past 3 yearsShould have similar experience with one of the SIs / GSIs in the Americas market and good understanding of the above mentioned industry segment needs

Experience Level (if available): None
